name: HopSwap
description:
HopSwap is a platformer made for the 5th "One Minute Game Jam" made by a group of five across 2 days in which you have to alter the state of platforms throughout 1 level.

You have 60 seconds to complete the stage before it restarts.

Controls are provided in-game.

Feedback is appreciated, have fun!

(We apologise for the janky collision, couldn't figure out how to fix it)
